select distinct t.id, t.username, t.nickname, t.gender, t.last_login_ip as lastLoginIp, t.last_login_date as lastLoginDate, t.status, t.created, t.remark, group_concat(r.role_name) as roleName, group_concat(r.role_name_cn) as roleNameCn from user t left join user_role ur on t.id = ur.user_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.id
and t.username like concat('%',#{user.username},'%')
group by t.id
